title: ODI Summit: Liam Maxwell - Keynote address

details.description: Liam Maxwell, government CTO at the cabinet office, delivers a keynote address at the ODI Summit, 2013.
details.excerpt: <iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/80543696?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="695" height="391" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
details.alternative_title: Liam Maxwell, government CTO at the cabinet office, delivers a keynote address at the ODI Summit, 2013.
details.content:
Liam Maxwell, government CTO at the cabinet office, delivers a keynote address at the ODI Summit, 2013.

Liam discusses the approach that the UK government has taken on both a practical and policy level when engaging with open data and the creation of digital public services.

The ODI Annual Summit was held on Tuesday 29th October 2013 in the Museum of London. Featuring high-profile speakers, open data luminaries and leading thinkers from business, government, technology and start-ups. The summit brought together an international line-up of acclaimed experts including world wide web inventor and ODI founder Sir Tim Berners-Lee. The summit was hosted by co-founder and chair Sir Nigel Shadbolt and CEO Gavin Starks.
